h1_title: How to Unlock the Secret Ending (True Ending)
h2_title: Find and Complete Mount Mei (The Great Pagoda)
content: Mount Mei can be accessed as soon as you complete the secret areas and finish the Treasure Hunter questline. However, if you want to see both endings, we'd recommend completing Chapter 6 of the game first. When you've beaten the final boss and viewed the original ending, press CONTINUE, rather than start a new cycle and follow the steps below to see the secret ending.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Secret_Ending_(True_Ending).md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Secret Ending (True Ending)', specifically from the subsection 'Find and Complete Mount Mei (The Great Pagoda)' and the sub-subsection 'See Both Endings'.
The content is as follows:
Mount Mei can be accessed as soon as you complete the secret areas and finish the Treasure Hunter questline. However, if you want to see both endings, we'd recommend completing Chapter 6 of the game first. When you've beaten the final boss and viewed the original ending, press CONTINUE, rather than start a new cycle and follow the steps below to see the secret ending.
